description:
Atsushi is abducted onto the Moby Dick. Meanwhile, Lovecraft succeeds in capturing Q. Francis F. and the Guild prepare to carry out what they call their "emergency plan."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anche se la mente può sbagliarsi
Atama wa Machigau Koto ga Atte mo
Selbst wenn der Kopf sich irren sollte...
Though the Mind May Be Wrong
頭は間違うことがあっても
